statements: SELECT * FROM anti_money_laundering_audit_trail
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM anti_money_laundering_audit_trail
SELECT user_id, transaction_date FROM anti_money_laundering_audit_trail WHERE transaction_type='deposit'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM anti_money_laundering_audit_trail ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM anti_money_laundering_audit_trail GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 10000
SELECT * FROM anti_money_laundering_audit_trail WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM anti_money_laundering_audit_trail ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_transaction_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM anti_money_laundering_audit_trail WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, transaction_type, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM anti_money_laundering_audit_trail GROUP BY user_id, transaction_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT compliance_officer_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), transaction_date)) AS avg_days_since_transaction FROM anti_money_laundering_audit_trail WHERE compliance_officer_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY compliance_officer_id ORDER BY avg_days_since_transaction DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails;
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_trails ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM aml_records WHERE transaction_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE action IN ('login', 'logout') ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT record_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM aml_records WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE audit_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_trails WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM aml_records WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT audit_id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_trails INNER JOIN aml_records ON audit_trails.audit_id = aml_records.record_id;
SELECT * FROM aml_records WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM audit_trails;
SELECT id, action, user_id, timestamp FROM audit_trails ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, regulation, status FROM compliance_records WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT transaction_id, suspicion_level FROM money_laundering WHERE report_generated=true;
SELECT id, transaction_id, report_date FROM money_laundering WHERE suspicion_level > 2 ORDER BY report_date;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 101 AND action = 'login';
SELECT transaction_id, action, user_id FROM audit_trails WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT id, user_id, regulation, status FROM compliance_records WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM money_laundering WHERE suspicion_level > 5 AND report_generated = true ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_trail ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, activity FROM suspicious_activity WHERE activity = 'Unauthorized Access'
SELECT id, amount, date FROM transaction WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM compliance_record ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT id, description, date FROM transaction WHERE date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, user_id, activity, timestamp FROM audit_trail ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM suspicious_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY total_activities DESC
SELECT * FROM compliance_record WHERE action LIKE '%deleted%' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, user_id, action, timestamp, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM timestamp) AS month FROM compliance_record WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM timestamp) = 6 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT id, action FROM audit_trail WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM compliance_record WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, amount, timestamp FROM transaction WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, address FROM customer_info WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM audit_trail ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id;
SELECT user_id, record FROM compliance_record WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT id, name, address FROM customer_info WHERE name ILIKE '%john%' AND address ILIKE '%street%';
SELECT id, user_id, message FROM alert WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
